msg:
Hello @{user}, I'm a bot from miniapp [template]('https://github.com/sht0rmx/tgminiapptemplate')
Main content of this project constains in webap! 

For help type /help or click button below.

app.msg: You can run bot's Miniapp by button below

msg:
Here is a list of commands that I can handle:

/start - show start message
/help - show all awalible commands
/app - open web app
[!] more possibilitys awailable in miniapp.
App can de oppened by inline button near message input, by command /app, from bot profile!
This is a preliminary list!
